about.title: About Shanbe Global
about.subtitle: Building bridges between Iran's innovation ecosystem and the world
about.mission_text_1: Shanbe Global Intelligence Portal serves as the definitive gateway to Iran's dynamic startup ecosystem. We provide data-driven intelligence, AI-powered insights, and trusted connections that empower global investors, researchers, and entrepreneurs to discover opportunities and build meaningful partnerships.
about.mission_text_2: Our platform bridges the information gap, offering transparent, verified, and actionable intelligence about one of the world's most promising yet underexplored innovation landscapes.
about.trust_text: Every data point is verified. Every insight is backed by research. We build trust through transparency and accuracy.
about.bridge_text: We connect Iranian innovation with international opportunities, fostering collaboration across borders and cultures.
about.innovation_text: Powered by cutting-edge AI and data science, we deliver insights that drive informed decision-making.
about.verified_text: All data is cross-referenced, verified, and regularly updated by our research team.
about.ai_text: Our specialized AI agents provide instant, intelligent analysis tailored to your needs.
about.network_text: Join a community of leading investors, researchers, and entrepreneurs.
about.cta_subtitle: Discover opportunities in Iran's thriving startup ecosystem today.

news.article_1_title: Digikala Enters IPO Talks with Tehran Stock Exchange
news.article_1_excerpt: Iran's largest e-commerce platform is preparing for a historic public offering that could value the company at over $2 billion, marking a significant milestone for the country's tech sector.
news.article_2_title: New AI Regulation Framework Announced in Tehran
news.article_2_excerpt: The Iranian government has unveiled comprehensive AI governance guidelines aimed at fostering innovation while ensuring ethical development of artificial intelligence technologies.
news.article_3_excerpt: TehranPay secures significant funding from regional investors to expand its digital payment infrastructure across Iran and neighboring markets.
news.article_4_excerpt: MedConnect, a telemedicine platform, celebrates a major milestone as it connects patients with healthcare providers across rural and urban areas.
news.article_5_title: New Accelerator Program Launches for CleanTech Startups
news.article_5_excerpt: Tehran Innovation Hub announces a specialized program focused on sustainable energy and environmental technology ventures with $10M in funding.
news.article_6_title: Cross-Border E-commerce Platform Expands to 5 Countries
news.article_6_excerpt: PersianMarket successfully launches operations in neighboring countries, facilitating trade and creating new opportunities for Iranian merchants.
